install.name: S5 VM Accordion Menu
install.author: Shape5.com
install.description: Category display module for Joomla and Virtuemart displays the list of categories and sub-categories in a accordion menu style. Produced by Shape5.com

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-Text
param.description: Enter any pre-text message.

param.name: maint_show
param.label: Show Account Links? yes or no

param.name: listall_show
param.label: Show List All Link? yes or no

param.name: search_show
param.label: Show Search Form? yes or no

param.name: cart_show
param.label: Show Mini Cart? yes or no

param.name: background
param.label: Background Color example:#FFFFFF (enter none for no background)
param.description: Enter a Hex value for the accordion background color. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontsize1
param.label: Level 1 Font Size
param.description: Enter a font size for level 1. example: 12px

param.name: fontcolor1
param.label: Level 1 Font Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 1. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontweight1
param.label: Level 1 Font Weight (normal or bold)
param.description: Enter the font weight for level 1.

param.name: fontcolorhover1
param.label: Level 1 Font Hover Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 1 hover. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontdecoration1
param.label: Level 1 Font Hover Decoration (underline or none)
param.description: Enter underline or none for the hover over effect.

param.name: lineheight1
param.label: Level 1 List Line Height in Percentage
param.description: Enter the line height for each list for level 1. example: 230%.

param.name: paddingl1
param.label: Left Padding For Level 1 Lists
param.description: Enter a left padding for each list in pixels.

param.name: marginl1
param.label: Left Margin For Level 1 Lists
param.description: Enter a left margin for each list in pixels.

param.name: marginr1
param.label: Right Margin For Level 1 Lists
param.description: Enter a right margin for each list in pixels.

param.label: Level 2 Font Size
param.description: Enter a font size for level 2. example: 12px

param.name: fontcolor2
param.label: Level 2 Font Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 2. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontweight2
param.label: Level 2 Font Weight (normal or bold)
param.description: Enter the font weight for level 2.

param.name: fontcolorhover2
param.label: Level 2 Font Hover Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 2 hover. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontdecoration2
param.label: Level 2 Font Hover Decoration (underline or none)
param.description: Enter underline or none for the hover over effect.

param.name: lineheight2
param.label: Level 2 List Line Height in Percentage
param.description: Enter the line height for each list for level 2. example: 230%.

param.name: paddingl2
param.label: Left Padding For Level 2 Lists
param.description: Enter a left padding for each list in pixels.

param.name: marginl2
param.label: Left Margin For Level 2 Lists
param.description: Enter a left margin for each list in pixels.

param.name: marginr2
param.label: Right Margin For Level 2 Lists
param.description: Enter a right margin for each list in pixels.

param.name: fontsize3
param.label: Level 3 Font Size
param.description: Enter a font size for level 3. example: 12px

param.name: fontcolor3
param.label: Level 3 Font Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 3. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontweight3
param.label: Level 3 Font Weight (normal or bold)
param.description: Enter the font weight for level 3.

param.name: fontcolorhover3
param.label: Level 3 Font Hover Color
param.description: Enter a font color for level 3 hover. example: #FFFFFF

param.name: fontdecoration3
param.label: Level 3 Font Hover Decoration (underline or none)
param.description: Enter underline or none for the hover over effect.

param.name: lineheight3
param.label: Level 3 List Line Height in Percentage
param.description: Enter the line height for each list for level 3. example: 230%.

param.name: paddingl3

param.name: marginb
param.label: Bottom Margin for Menu
param.description: Enter a bottom margin. example: 12px

param.name: margint
param.label: Top Margin for Menu
param.description: Enter a top margin. example: 12px

param.name: marginl
param.label: Left Margin for Menu
param.description: Enter a left margin. example: 12px

param.name: marginr
param.label: Right Margin for Menu
param.description: Enter a right margin. example: 12px

param.name: speed1
param.label: Open Speed (1 is fast 100 is slow)
param.description: Enter an opening speed for the lists.

param.name: speed2
param.label: Close Speed (1 is fast 100 is slow)
param.description: Enter a closing speed for the lists.

param.name: ie7speed1
param.label: IE7 Adjustment Speed
param.description: Unfortunately Internet Explorer 7 has issues with javascript load speeds and the open/close speed can vary between templates. If you need to adjust the speeds for IE7 enter a lower number to slow it down or a higher number to speed it up. All other browsers are not effected by this.

param.name: fadespeed
param.label: Fade Speed in seconds. example: 1.1 - (Entering 0 will disable the fade) - Unfortunately due to issues with Internet Explorer and opacity some larger menu lists may appear choppy due to the opacity effect. The default setting of 1.1 seconds will be sufficient in most cases but if you are experiences issues in Internet Explorer the solution is to turn off the opacity by setting the seconds to 0 or increasing the seconds.
